pull.title: [qa] Fix compact block shortids for a test case
pull.body: Hash of the tx in the transaction response did not match the shortid provided in the compact block. With this fix it does.

events.message: [qa] Fix compact block shortids for a test case

events.body: utACK 4cdece40419bcc97345357f9268e03b0aff400b5, though I dont think we need to backport when a test is just overspecified.
